attributes.action: Define a bedroom by size and requirements.
attributes.additional_details: Before this bedroom tax goes too much further and people are evicted from their homes for rent shortfalls, we, the public, would like to see a CLEAR definition of what actually constitutes a bedroom. This needs to include both minimum size and what equipment needs to be present for a normal life. This needs taking out of the hands of landlords now, and the Government should issue a legal and binding statement to define guidelines.
